SpikeCV

I'm leading SpikeCV, an open-source project designed for the emerging field of spike camera vision. It brings together spiking datasets, reusable algorithms, and hardware interfaces â€” everything you need to explore fast, brain-inspired vision. The goal is to build a community around spike-based computing and help researchers get from simulation to real-world deployment.

Thanks to the main colloborators! Jiyuan Zhang, Rui Zhao, Jianhao Ding, Shiyan Chen, Weijian Wu and Tiejun Huang. ğŸ’›

Weâ€™d love to have you on board if youâ€™re interested â€” feel free to reach out and join us! âœ¨
